1.content: Portal UGT TOWA - Complete PWA & Notification System Implementation

2.details: Set up proper domain configuration for the UGT TOWA portal. Current deployment is at space.minimax.io - need to configure the production domain UGT-Towa.eu for professional branding and accessibility.

3.content: Setup Production VAPID Keys for Push Notifications
3.details: Configure production VAPID keys for secure push notification delivery. Current system has development keys - need production-ready keys for real-world deployment and proper notification delivery.

4.details: Add comprehensive analytics tracking and performance monitoring. Monitor user engagement, PWA installation rates, notification delivery rates, page load times, and user behavior patterns.

5.content: SEO Optimization and Search Engine Visibility
5.details: Enhance search engine optimization including meta tags, structured data, sitemap generation, robots.txt optimization, and Google Search Console integration for better discoverability.

6.content: Consider Native Mobile App Development with Capacitor
6.details: Evaluate the possibility of creating a native mobile app using Capacitor based on the existing PWA. This would provide app store distribution and enhanced mobile experience while maintaining the web-based architecture.
